ptageatnotification.tooltip_en: Your age when you had a recent heart attack.
ptageatnotification.tooltip_bm: Umur anda ketika mengalami serangan jantung baru-baru ini.

sex.tooltip_en: What is your gender? The patient's biological sex. Risk scores may differ between men and women. Values: 0 = Men, 1 = Women.
sex.tooltip_bm: Apakah jantina anda? Jantina biologi pesakit. Markah risiko mungkin berbeza antara lelaki dan wanita. Nilai: 0 = Lelaki, 1 = Perempuan

heartrate.question_en: Please enter your latest Heart Rate value
heartrate.question_bm: Sila masukkan nilai Denyutan Jantung anda terkini
heartrate.tooltip_en: The patient's heart rate in beats per minute (bpm). A normal resting heart rate is typically between 60-100 bpm.
heartrate.tooltip_bm: Kadar denyutan jantung pesakit dalam denyutan seminit (bpm). Kadar denyutan jantung rehat yang biasanya antara 60-100 bpm.

canginapast2wk.question_en: Have you had chest pain recently ? Chronic Angina (Past 2 weeks)
canginapast2wk.question_bm: Adakah anda mengalami sakit dada baru-baru ini? Angina Kronik (2 minggu lepas)
canginapast2wk.tooltip_en: Indicates if the patient experienced symptoms such as chest tightness, shortness of breath in the past 2 weeks. Values: 0 = No, 1 = Yes.
canginapast2wk.tooltip_bm: Menunjukkan jika pesakit mengalami simptom seperti sesak dada, sesak nafas dalam tempoh 2 minggu yang lalu. Nilai: 0 = Tidak, 1 = Ya.

killipclass.question_en: If you have recently had a heart attack, has your doctor told you that your heart is weak?
killipclass.question_bm: Sekiranya anda ada diserang penyakit jantung baru-baru ini, adakah doktor anda ada memberitahu yang jantung anda lemah?

follow_up.question_en: If yes, what is the condition of your heart?
follow_up.question_bm: Sekiranya Ya, apakah keadaan jantung anda?

tooltip_en.No: My heart is fine and I have no experience shortness of breath (Killip Class I)

Yes.2: The doctor told me that my heart is weak and I have difficulty breathing (Killip Class II)

Yes.3: The doctor told me that my heart is weak and there is water in my lungs after checking or doing a chest X-ray (Killip Class III)

Yes.4: The doctor told me that my heart is weak and I have low blood pressure (Killip Class IV)

tooltip_bm.Tiada: Jantung saya dalam keadaan baik dan tidak mengalami sesak nafas

Ya.2: Doktor beritahu jantung saya lemah dan mengalami kesukaran bernafas (Killip Class 2)

Ya.3: Doktor beritahu jantung saya lemah dan beritahu ada air di dalam paru-paru setelah diperiksa atau melakukan X-ray dada (Killip Class 3)

Ya.4: Doktor beritahu jantung saya lemah dan mengalami tekanan darah rendah (Killip Class 4)

tc.tooltip_en: What is your Total Cholesterol reading recently? Total cholesterol, a measure of all cholesterol in the blood. High levels can increase the risk of heart disease. Normal range: <5.17 mmol/L.
tc.tooltip_bm: Apakah bacaan Jumlah kolesterol anda yang terkini?, ukuran semua kolesterol dalam darah. Tahap yang tinggi boleh meningkatkan risiko penyakit jantung. Julat normal: <5.17 mmol/L.

hdlc.tooltip_en: What is your good cholesterol (HDL) reading recently? High-Density Lipoprotein (HDL) cholesterol, often referred to as 'good' cholesterol. Higher levels are typically better for cardiovascular health. Normal range: >1.03 mmol/L.
hdlc.tootltip_bm: Apakah bacaan Kolesterol baik (HDL) anda yang terkini? Kolesterol Lipoprotein Berketumpatan Tinggi (HDL), sering dirujuk sebagai kolesterol 'baik'. Tahap yang lebih tinggi biasanya lebih baik untuk kesihatan kardiovaskular. Julat normal: >1.03 mmol/L

ldlc.tooltip_en: What is your bad cholesterol (LDL) reading recently? Low-Density Lipoprotein (LDL) cholesterol, often referred to as 'bad' cholesterol. High levels increase the risk of heart disease. Normal range: <2.6 mmol/L.
ldlc.tooltip_bm: Apakah bacaan kolesterol jahat (LDL) anda yang terkini? Kolesterol Lipoprotein Ketumpatan Rendah (LDL), sering dirujuk sebagai kolesterol 'jahat'. Tahap yang tinggi meningkatkan risiko penyakit jantung. Julat normal: <2.6 mmol/L.

fbg.tooltip_en: Please enter your blood glucose value during fasting. Normal range: 3.9 mmol/L - 5.6 mmol/L
fbg.tooltip_bm: Sila masukkan nilai gula dalam darah anda semasa berpuasa. Julat normal: 3.9 mmol/L - 5.6 mmol/L

cabg.question_en: Have you ever had coronary artery bypass surgery (CABG)? Coronary Artery Bypass Graft
cabg.question_bm: Pernahkah anda melakukan pembedahan cantuman pintasan jantung (CABG)? Cantuman Pintasan Arteri Koronari
cabg.tooltip_en: Indicates whether the patient has undergone coronary artery bypass graft (CABG) surgery, which improves blood flow to the heart. Values: 0 = No, 1 = Yes.
cabg.tooltip_bm: Menunjukkan sama ada pesakit telah menjalani pembedahan pintasan arteri koronari (CABG), yang meningkatkan aliran darah ke jantung. Nilai: 0 = Tidak, 1 = Ya.

cardiaccath.tooltip_en: Have you ever had a coronary angiogram procedure? Indicates whether the patient has undergone coronary angiogram. Values: 0 = No, 1 = Yes.
cardiaccath.tooltip_bm: Pernahkah anda menjalani prosedur koronari angiogram? Menunjukkan sama ada pesakit telah menjalani angiogram koronari. Nilai: 0 = Tidak, 1 = Ya.

ecgabnormlocationll.question_en: Have you ever been told by a doctor that your ECG is abnormal?
ecgabnormlocationll.question_bm: Pernahkah anda diberitahu oleh doktor yang ECG anda tidak normal?

follow_up.question_en: If yes, is it patterned ST Elevation, ST Depression or Left Bundle Branch Block?
follow_up.question_bm: Sekira Ya, adakah ia bercorak ST Elevation, ST Depression atau Left Bundle Branch Block?

lipidla.tooltip_en: Are you taking lipid lowering medication? . Values: 0 = No, 1 = Yes.
lipidla.tooltip_bm: Adakah anda mengambil ubat untuk menurunkan paras kolesterol? Nilai: 0 = Tidak, 1 = Ya.

statin.tooltip_en: Do you take the following medication : Lovastatin, Fibrate, Exetemibe,PCSK9 for lowering your cholesterol level? Indicates whether the patient is taking statins to lower cholesterol levels. Values: 0 = No, 1 = Yes.
statin.tooltip_bm: Adakah anda mengambil ubat berikut : Lovastatin, fibrate, Exetemibe, PCSK9 untuk menurunkan paras kolesterol anda? Menunjukkan sama ada pesakit mengambil statin untuk menurunkan paras kolesterol. Nilai: 0 = Tidak, 1 = Ya.

antiarr.question_en: Are you taking medication to control your heart rhythm? Anti-Arrhythmic Agent
antiarr.question_bm: Adakah anda mengambil ubat untuk mengawal ritma jantung anda? Agen Anti-Aritmia
antiarr.tooltip_en: Such as amiodarone, flecamide. Values: 0 = No, 1 = Yes.
antiarr.tooltip_bm: Seperti amiodarone, flecamide. Nilai: 0 = Tidak, 1 = Ya.

bpsys_treatment.tooltip_en: Are you taking high blood pressure medication? Indicates if the patient is receiving treatment for high blood pressure. Values: 0 = Not treated, 1 = Treated.
bpsys_treatment.tooltip_bm: Adakah anda mengambil ubat tekanan darah tinggi? Menunjukkan jika pesakit sedang menerima rawatan untuk tekanan darah tinggi. Nilai: 0 = Tidak dirawat, 1 = Dirawat.

diabetes.tooltip_en: Do you have diabetes? Indicates if the patient has diabetes, a significant risk factor for heart disease. Values: 0 = No, 1 = Yes.
diabetes.tooltip_bm: Adakah anda mengidap penyakit kencing manis? Menunjukkan jika pesakit menghidap Kencing Manis, faktor risiko yang ketara untuk penyakit jantung. Nilai: 0 = Tidak, 1 = Ya.

oralhypogly.question_en: Are you taking medication to control blood sugar? Oral Hypoglycemic Agent
oralhypogly.question_bm: Adakah anda mengambil ubat untuk mengawal paras gula? agen Hipoglisemik Oral
oralhypogly.tooltip_en: Do you take the following medication: metformin, sulfonylurea, SGLT-Inhibitor, GLP-Inhibitor. Values: 0 = No, 1 = Yes.
oralhypogly.tooltip_bm: Adakah anda mengambil ubat berikut: metformin, sulfonylurea, SGLT-Inhibitor, GLP-Inhibitor. Nilai: 0 = Tidak, 1 = Ya.

smoker.tooltip_en: Do you currently smoke cigarettes, vape, or use any other tobacco products? Indicates if the patient is a current smoker, which increases the risk of cardiovascular disease. Values: 0 = No, 1 = Yes.
smoker.tooltip_bm: Adakah pada masa ini anda menghisap rokok, vape, atau menggunakan mana-mana produk tembakau lain? Menunjukkan jika pesakit adalah seorang perokok semasa, yang meningkatkan risiko penyakit kardiovaskular. Nilai: 0 = Tidak, 1 = Ya.

follow_up.question_en: If you used to smoke but have quit, how long has it been since you stopped?
follow_up.question_bm: Jika anda pernah merokok tetapi telah berhenti, sudah berapa lama anda telah berhenti merokok?
